snippet: While few people may be laughing on Capitol Hill, the government shutdown is irresistible fodder for late-night comedy. The subject has been at the top of every monologue, and the inspiration for several much-viewed comedy bits.
abstract: While few people may be laughing on Capitol Hill, the government shutdown is irresistible fodder for late-night comedy. The subject has been at the top of every monologue, and the inspiration for several much-viewed comedy bits.

headline.main: Shutdown Provides Material for Late Night
